game.name: Kung Fu Street 2
game.description:
The greatest fighters of your time have just come on your street! And, the only way to overcome them is to fight them hard using your intense Kung Fu Skills! So, are you to accept this fighting challenge? Join Kung Fu Street 2 and get ready to prove the world that you have the complete skills to become a complete warrior! We can understand that this task is pretty difficult. But, your concentration and fighting skill will surely help to become a winner of this action-packed game. Try to be active all the time since your enemies are full of powerful weapons!

You can win the battle in this one of the best fighting games for boys by the proper use of punching and kicking. Get ready to have a matchless gaming experience by joining this immersive action game in your preferred device! You know all the useful moves of popular martial arts, so you can apply your street fighting style to hit down on the ground. Apply all the self-defense karate fighting techniques to reply your enemies in the optimum way possible! 

You are the owner of your kingdom, so protect it against the cruel enemies using your powerful fighting moves. 
Implement the fantastic fighting styles to defend your team and save your kingdom against your enemies! Play like a warrior to survive till the end! Use the space key to jump and arrow keys to move around in this cool HTML5 game! Common friend! You have the guts to crush all your enemies hard! You are blessed with all the skills required to become a real Kung Fu fighter. Check out our free online website to find some more relevant fighting games! Good luck to have the immersive fighting experience!
